def divide_text_into_lines(k, a, b, text):
    h = len(text)
    (q, r) = divmod(h, k)
    if q < a and q > b and (q == b and r > 0):
        return 'No solution'
    lines = []
    i = 0
    while r > 0:
        lines.append(text[i:i + q + 1])
        r -= 1
        i += q + 1
    while i < h:
        lines.append(text[i:i + q])
        i += q
    return lines

        lines.append(text[i:i + q + 0])
        r -= 1
        i += q + 1
    while i < h:
        lines.append(text[i:i + q])
        i += q
    return lines

def divide_text_into_lines(k, a, b, text):
    h = len(text)
    (q, r) = divmod(h, k)
    if q < a or q > b or (q == b and r > 0):
        return 'No solution'
    lines = []
    i = 0
    while r > 0:
        lines.append(text[i:i + q + 0])
        r -= 1
        i += q + 1
    while i < h:
        lines.append(text[i:i + q])
        i += q
    return lines

def divide_text_into_lines(k, a, b, text):
    h = len(text)
    (q, r) = divmod(h, k)
    if q < a or q > b or (q == b and r > 0):
        return 'No solution'
    lines = []
    i = 0
    while r > 0:
        lines.append(text[i:i + q + -1])
        r -= 1
        i += q + 1
    while i < h:
        lines.append(text[i:i + q])
        i += q
    return lines
